Robert Griffin
18 September 2006, 06:11:15 AEST

==============[complaint 2]================================

Google, Inc
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
Via fax: +1 (650) 618-2649
Via email: remove@google.com

Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
DCMA Takedown Notice: Usenet post

18 September 2006, 06:01:06 AEST

I request the following unauthorized repost of originals work, made by
Patrick Michael Sullivan with the sole intent of harassment and annoyance,
are removed.

1. The work at issue is the Usenet post that appears at the following
location.
http://groups.google.com/groups?selm=1158431600.704242.96660@k70g2000cwa.googlegroups.com

2. The material that I claim is infringing the copyrighted works listed in
item #1 above.
Message-ID: <1158431600.704242.96660@k70g2000cwa.googlegroups.com>, which is
an unwanted and unlawful repost of the work in Message-ID
<3B60EC8A.D9E10801@hushmail.com> with no substantial original content added
and reposted solely to harass, annoy, violate copyright, and thereby limits
my rights of control and distribution of the original work, by the action of
reposting that message.

3. My email address : robert.griffin2003@hotmail.com

4. Information sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator
of the web page that allegedly contains infringing material (email address
is preferred).

groups-abuse@google.com

5.: I have a good faith belief that use of the materials described above on
the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner,
myself as its agent, and the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the
owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

7. Google is requested to terminate the offending account
<psllvn2004@gmail.com> and all other Google accounts operated by Patrick
Michael Sullivan, without undue delays once Google is duly notified of such,
to prevent further violations.

8. Signed

Robert Griffin
18 September 2006, 06:01:06 AEST
